original_text:
For the lips of a forbidden woman drip honey,
    and her speech is smoother than oil,
korean_text: 대저 음녀의 입술은 꿀을 떨어뜨리며 그의 입은 기름보다 미끄러우나

sentences.original_text: For the lips of a forbidden woman drip honey
sentences.korean_translation: 대저 금지된 여자의 입술은 꿀을 떨어뜨리니

sentences.original_text: and her speech is smoother than oil
